 2003-04492003-04-01,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  HERITAGE, 
ActCanadian Race Relations Foundation Act
PrecisAppointment of MYRNA E. LASHLEY of Verdun, Quebec, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canadian Race Relations Foundation to hold office during pleasure for a term of three years, effective April 9, 2003.
